sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { ArrowRight, Star, MapPin, Clock, TrendingUp, Zap } from 'lucide-react'; const HomePage = () => { // Sample data - this would normally come from an API const featuredAds = [ { id: 1, title: "Summer Sale - Up to 70% Off Electronics", description: "Limited time offer on smartphones, laptops, and accessories", image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1607082348824-0a96f2a4b9da?w=800&h=400&fit=crop", discount: "70%", validUntil: "Dec 31, 2024" }, { id: 2, title: "Fashion Week Special", description: "Designer clothes and accessories at unbeatable prices", image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1441986300917-64674bd600d8?w=800&h=400&fit=crop", discount: "50%", validUntil: "Dec 25, 2024" } ]; const categories = [ { id: 'electronics', name: 'Electronics', icon: 'üì±', count: '12,453', image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1498049794561-7780e7231661?w=300&h=200&fit=crop' }, { id: 'fashion', name: 'Fashion', icon: 'üëó', count: '8,921', image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1445205170230-053b83016050?w=300&h=200&fit=crop' }, { id: 'home-garden', name: 'Home & Garden', icon: 'üè†', count: '6,734', image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1586023492125-27b2c045efd7?w=300&h=200&fit=crop' }, { id: 'automotive', name: 'Automotive', icon: 'üöó', count: '4,567', image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1493238792000-8113da705763?w=300&h=200&fit=crop' }, { id: 'sports', name: 'Sports', icon: '‚öΩ', count: '3,892', image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1571019613454-1cb2f99b2d8b?w=300&h=200&fit=crop' }, { id: 'books', name: 'Books', icon: 'üìö', count: '5,234', image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1481627834876-b7833e8f5570?w=300&h=200&fit=crop' } ]; const featuredProducts = [ { id: 1, title: "iPhone 15 Pro Max", price: 1199, originalPrice: 1299, location: "New York, NY", image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1592750475338-74b7b21085ab?w=300&h=300&fit=crop", rating: 4.8, isNew: true, postedTime: "2 hours ago" }, { id: 2, title: "Gaming Laptop RTX 4080", price: 2499, originalPrice: 2799, location: "Los Angeles, CA", image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1603302576837-37561b2e2302?w=300&h=300&fit=crop", rating: 4.9, isNew: false, postedTime: "5 hours ago" }, { id: 3, title: "Designer Leather Jacket", price: 299, originalPrice: 599, location: "Chicago, IL", image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1551028719-00167b16eac5?w=300&h=300&fit=crop", rating: 4.7, isNew: true, postedTime: "1 day ago" }, { id: 4, title: "Mountain Bike", price: 899, originalPrice: 1199, location: "Denver, CO", image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1558618666-fcd25c85cd64?w=300&h=300&fit=crop", rating: 4.6, isNew: false, postedTime: "3 days ago" } ]; return (
{/* Hero Section */}

Buy, Sell, Connect

Discover amazing deals in your neighborhood and beyond

Start Shopping Start Selling
{/* Featured Ads Section */}

Featured Deals

Don't miss out on these amazing offers

{featuredAds.map((ad) => (
{ad.discount} OFF Valid until {ad.validUntil}

{ad.title}

{ad.description}

))}
{/* Categories Section */}

Shop by Category

Explore our wide range of categories

{categories.map((category) => (
{category.icon}

{category.name}

{category.count} items

))}
{/* Featured Products Section */}

Featured Products

Handpicked deals for you

View All
{featuredProducts.map((product) => (
{product.isNew && ( New )}

{product.title}

${product.price} ${product.originalPrice}
{product.rating}
{product.location}
{product.postedTime}
))}
{/* Stats Section */}
50K+
Active Users
100K+
Products Listed
25K+
Successful Deals
500+
Cities Covered
); }; export default HomePage;
